data.text: A gorgeous hotel with beautiful and well-kept grounds. Very good location. Super nice and professional staff, they provided a high level of service and made sure your stay at the hotel was absolutely memorable and perfect. The food selection is rich and delicious. The rooms are tastefully furnished, have a wonderful view and are very clean. Private clean beaches. Entertainment with live music every night. High-end spa and beauty salon services. There is everything here to spend a wonderful vacation and to let yourself be pampered. Highly recommended
data.title: Best place in Sharm to spend a amazing vacation

data.text: Overall the holiday in Stella di Mare was really amazing! We were very lucky to be welcomed by Mena Aziz at the reception and this was the most kind, professional, warm and friendly welcome, which we ever had (we travel 4-5 times a year) and we appreciated it very much.  A separate thanks goes to lobby bar (Mohamed (the manager), Mohamed, Mario and Maher. The food and drinks are of exceptional quality (every dinner was dedicated to some region and the food was very delicious with a lot of options to choose from), comparing with other hotels in Egypt it is outstanding. Every time it was difficult to choose what to eat, as the variety was so rich. Most of staff really try to do everything and more to make you happy and enjoy your holiday, however Fahmy from the reception made us feel unwelcomed with our inquiry, so that a little bit overclouded our stay. However overall experience was great and we will definatelly come back to this hotel! We hope very much to be welcomed by Mena Aziz when we come back our next time!
data.title: Amazing holiday!

data.text: Absolutely wonderful stay at Stella Di Mare. Even the moaniest of people would struggle to complain about anything here. The hotel and grounds are gorgeous, well maintained and clean. The service is outstanding and they cant do enough for you. The food is lovely, fresh, hot and plentiful. They have barbecues, fresh stations for pizza, meat, eggs and pasta, more salad and cake options that anyone could need and huge hot buffet trays with food that was actually kept hot. We had treatmemts in the spa which were professional and very well priced. I have already recommended this hotel to friends and would return
data.title: Absolutely wonderful stay at Stella Di Mare

data.text:
We have just returned from a three week fabulous stay at the Stella Di mare in Sharm El Sheikh.
This has been our 4th visit to this Hotel and it seems to get better on every stay.
The staff as many people mention are the best we have ever had the pleasure to meet.
Nothing is too much trouble from the warm welcome at the reception dest to the extremely pleasant customer relations manager to the cleaners of your room they all make sure they know your name and greet you with that on every meeting during your stay.
The management team are extraordinary especially the food and drinks managers Shenouda Farid and Hany George who looked after us both so well.
They must have spoken to us at least 3 times a day making sure everything was okay with our stay.
The food is delicious at all three restaurants and the main buffet restaurant.
"La terrazza"
Is the main buffet restaurant and we loved the attention to detail by Mina and his team there is so much choice you would be hard pussed not to find something you didn't like.
"Corallo Rosso" restaurant
Is the Mediterranean restaurant which you have to book but it's well worth the 50 meter walk to book this.
It's just a fabulous atmosphere and great food served with very polite staff like Romany and his team.
"La Scogliera" 
Is the Asian fusion restaurant overlooking the beautiful red sea which is lit up at night.
The food is just stupendous ( our favourite was the Chicken with Lemon grass soup ) 
The staff are very attentive and polite led by Milad and his team.
"Beach Bar"
This is just the perfect place to have lunch in a beautiful shady area serving good food with spectacular views over Narma Bay and the red sea.
The service is quick and very attentive all overseen by Issak and his team.
"Chill out bar" 
Is the swim up bar or pool area bar for adults only 
Here you can get the most delicious cocktails all served by the every  eager team of Mina,Bishoy and the mixologist Mohammed.
The life guards look after your very need from towels to sunbeds and even cleaning your glasses .
But don't think they take their job lightly, whilst we was there Carlos had to react with such speed it was amazing when a customer got into difficulties and had to be rescued and given CPR the customer made a full recovery thank god.
He then two days later spent 30 minutes searching the pool for a ladies wedding ring which he did finally find and return to a very greatful customer.
I have to mention the other two life guards we met who are Romany and Nabil.
The beds and pillows in this hotel are the best we have ever used at any hotel we have stayed at.
The hotel is spotless and the gardens are a pleasure to walk around.
All these things only work if the staff and management team are happy with each other and the quality they are providing.
The lack of turnover of staff tells me the the staff are very happy with there positions and management teams.
We are going back in October and this time it's for 4 weeks.
We can't wait to see our extended family
Thank you
data.title: Outstanding spectacular Hotel

data.text:
Stella di Mare has the looks of an old classy mediterranean hotel .. . Staying there brings back memories of the great sevice we used to get in those hotels. the Staff is exceptional , friendly and capable , they all have been with the hotel for years and know every trick to get you what you want or need, be it laundry service , a technician, a doctor, expresso or capucino. Never been in a hotel where so many guests were people who had been coming there for years and years (15-16- 17 visits, unbelievable).
Romany was the best pool attendant ever,  Taleb &Mohamed took care of our drinks. The crew at the restaurants became like family. The room and hallways were kept spotless. Reception treated me like a king , nothing was impossible and delivered pronto. My wife needed medical attention , the docter showed up soon after our call and provided expert very friendly medical care until midnight when necessary.
we took them up on their 'romantic dinner by the sea' offer, a never to forget experience. The 'Desert Rose Diving' centre is living up to the standards set by the hotel
thank you, stella di Mare
data.title: super service and a dedication to satisfying their customers, seldom delivered at hat price
